<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Basic Mysteries](/Feats.aspx?ID=1852) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 152 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Oracle](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=42)

**Prerequisites**

</column>

---

You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level [oracle feat](/Classes.aspx?ID=14/feats) of your choice.

<title level="2">Basic Mysteries leads to...</title>
[Advanced Mysteries](/Feats.aspx?ID=1855)
